resources.string: Demonstration of using RecyclerView with a LinearLayoutManager and GridLayoutManager to create a vertical list. Tap \"SHOW LOG\" to view elements as they are bound to their ViewHolder. The log also displays elements that you tap.

This is a CardView widget. CardView widgets can have shadows and rounded corners. 

To create a card with a shadow, use the android:elevation attribute. 

To set the corner radius in your layouts, use the card_view:cardCornerRadius attribute.
